website_summaries.verdict: A versatile model with some unique features, but its size and price make it impractical for some consumers.
pros: Stands out for using UV light instead of water or steam to sterilize bottles, toys, pacifiers, and other baby items
Can also be used for electronics and more
cons: At 15 pounds, it's heavy, and its wide design takes up a lot of counter space

customer_reviews.title: I really loved this product until it broke
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this product until it broke. This worked for 10 days and the the UV sterilizing setting stopped working. It was rather disappointing. I've sent it back and awaiting the refund. The process of sending it back is truly a pain in the neck. I want to give the UviCube another chance but I just don't know if that would be a good idea. The other thing to consider is the size. I didn't mind the size but I can see that it may be a little large for some kitchen counters.
customer_reviews.author: For the love of Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: So far this thing has been a life saver! With all the pumping equipment, bottles binkies, etc. It has saved so much time drying and sterilizing everything. It is pretty big so it can do a lot at once. Before we had this we used to steam sterilize everything but drying was always an issue. The bottles would still be wet by the time we went to use them next. This solved that problem.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mcmillan

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today. Love it so far. Like not having to add water, and clean the hotplate like the steam solutions. Seems to dry really well. Can also do 9 Medela 8oz bottles on the bottom rack with plenty of space between bottles, so the size is also very good.
customer_reviews.author: S. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Creates a clean feeling home environment...
customer_reviews.text: We use Uvicube not just for baby bottles, but also for household items we couldn't we couldn't easily sterilize before - things like toys, toothbrushes, and our phones. It's very intuitive to use (there's only 2 buttons), nice to look at (we have it out on our kitchen counter where its easy to reach), and we end up using it a lot - on the whole, it makes our home environment feel so much cleaner. Highly recommended for new parents!
customer_reviews.author: javahava

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Buy's when you have kids
customer_reviews.text: One of the Best Buy's when you have kids ... it's nice to have sterile dry bottles, but it's great to have a place where we can sterilize the toys teethers pacifiers and misc things like remotes! ( for some reason one kid is always holding them in their mouth... mine don't have the small buttons or the batteries)
customer_reviews.author: Anetora

customer_reviews.title: Using this for my second child as for the first ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this for my second child as for the first I used steam sterilizers and I have to say this product is genius. I pump a lot and having the bottles and pumping accessories already come out of the uvi cube dry and disinfected is absolutely life changing. Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Stella Gutman

customer_reviews.title: Great peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Our Uvicube shipped faster than expected, arrived beautifully packaged, and is now a big part of our household hygiene. We use it for toothbrushes, razors, remote controls, keys, wallets, cosmetic brushes, kitchen sponges, roomba components... the list grows by the week. My wife especially loves it for things like her purse and certain waxed cotton (Barbour) jackets, which can't go in the wash, but still get germy from everyday use. It's the middle of flu season and I already find our family of 3 (including a very active and curious-fingered 2-year old) getting sick less often and for shorter durations than last winter. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lee

customer_reviews.title: Makes bottle washing so quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: I had been researching this product for a month and there was nothing like it available in the US. It was only from South Korea and the plug would not work in the US so when I saw this come out I was so excited. About to be a second time mom and with my first I used the microwave steam thing but you had to put water in the bottom and they always come out with condensation on them and would never dry quick enough to put formula in them. This will dry and sanitize. It takes 45 minutes for perfect bottles to pour formula right into when it comes out. Absolutely love this product!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: It has been working great until today
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for less than a month. It has been working great until today. The uv is still working but the other light bulb which is used for the dry circle is broken. I replaced it with a spare one coming in the same box but it is broken again!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Saves at least 10-20 mins. With clean up every day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uv light does not penetrate plastic or glass
customer_reviews.text: Cool idea. Not sure why it's great for bottles or rather pumping parts when the directions say that the uv light does not penetrate plastic or glass. So the outside gets sterilized but the parts that must be sterilized don't get cleaned. So basically it is a pretty box that is very expensive and won't work for the intended purpose. Along with the whole Mercury bulb as mentioned by the previous reviewer this thing got packed up faster than it was unwrapped. Sent back the next day. Not feeling confident to use this for our new preemie.
customer_reviews.author: Deep Blue Sea

customer_reviews.title: This UV Sterilizer Rocks. Thank you Uvicube!
customer_reviews.text: I am a total clean freak - so I got this UV sterilizer for my babies bottles because of another friend's recommendation. Not only does it work great, the sterilizer is super cute, and reminds me of a sleek apple product that I'm really proud display on my kitchen counter. I've tried sterilizing other things besides bottles, including my iphone, water bottles. It's super easy to use! I wish they had a smaller one so I could take it with me when I travelled! I also wish it is in orange because it's my favorite color. I would highly recommend this product to any new mom! LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kalika Yap

customer_reviews.title: UviCube is legit.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the UviCube for friends who were having their first child. The UviCube sterilizes and sanitizes just as expected, our friends are thrilled. It is perfect size to fit on the kitchen counter, and has a very nice clean look. Such a great product for the new parents who are concerned about the overabundance of germs. Bottom line is, it is easy and worry free.
customer_reviews.author: M Cristina Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great product but has safety issues!
customer_reviews.text: We put this on our baby registry and use the machine everyday. BUT, the inside has a design flaw where there is raw metal sticking out between the lining of the door and the unit. It should be flush, but the raw edge is so sharp it has cut our hands several times. If it wasn't for the sharp edge and multiple bleeding cuts, we'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: alan lu

customer_reviews.title: Heat bulb problem
customer_reviews.text: The heating lamp is broken after 1 month of use. I have no idea where to buy a replacement so I cannot use its drying function. The manufacturer should include a few backup bulbs in the package or at least list the bulb in its website so people can know where to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jin L.

customer_reviews.title: A germaphobes dream come true!
customer_reviews.text: One the easiest ways to sanitize baby products. As two germaphobe parents, this product has made our lives so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole DiGiacobbe

customer_reviews.title: Easier and Safer
customer_reviews.text: It just made our lifes much easier and we feel much more confortable about our baby safety!
customer_reviews.author: MAGDA ALVES OSHIMA

product_meta.title: UviCube UV Sterilizer, Sanitizer & Dryer for Baby Bottles, Toys, Electronics & More, Rocket Gray
product_meta.description: UviCube is the first baby-focused sanitizing device in the U.S. to utilize the germicidal properties of ultraviolet (UV) light on everything from baby bottles and pacifiers to mobile phones and electronics. Parents who wish to efficiently and conveniently sanitize items their babies use and touch everyday can use UviCube to eliminate 99.9% of harmful bacteria when exposed to UV light. UviCube was found to eliminate 99.9% of bacteria on surfaces exposed to UV light by a nationally recognized third party ISO 17025 accredited test facility in the United States, and in compliance with U.S. and international regulatory requirements for independence and impartiality of lab data. The study involved Salmonella Enterica, Pseudomonas Aeruginosa, Klebsiella Pneumoniae, Staphylococcus Aureus and Escherichia Coli. * Study results are available on the UviCube website. UviCube also dries and stores wet items such as baby bottles, pacifiers and cups without the risk burns, set-up or clean up. Items can be organized and stored until you need them. UviCube features a highly reflective inner chamber that maximizes the reach of UV light to kill bacteria on exposed surfaces of the contents inside, with the simple press of a button. Offering more versatility than just a simple baby bottle sterilizer, UviCubes UV light can be safer than boiling water or using hot steam, protecting users from the risk of burns, and is able to sanitize the surfaces of moisture and heat-sensitive items such as electronics and other personal items.
feature_bullets: Eliminate 99.9% of harmful bacteria on surfaces exposed to UV light
Dry and Store Baby Bottles, Pacifiers, Cups and Utensils in one convenient place
Conveniently sanitize toys, mobile phones, remote controls, electronics & more
No boiling water, No risk of burns, No Set Up, No Clean Up
120 VAC, 60 Hz, U.S. Std. Plug. ETL listed for U.S. and Canada, using UL rated parts and components.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars27 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
